card_text: Send 1 Tuner and 1 non-Tuner from your face-up field to the GY; Special Summon both of the following monsters from your Extra Deck.$N●1 Synchro Monster that could be Synchro Summoned using just those 2 monsters in the GY as material.$N●1 Fusion Monster that could be Fusion Summoned using just those 2 monsters in the GY as material.$NYou cannot Special Summon from the Extra Deck the turn you activate this card, except Fusion or Synchro Monsters. You can only activate 1 "Harmonic Synchro Fusion" per turn.
